sqlMap.select: SELECT TT.CL_CODE, TT.CL_NM, TT.FILE_CODE, TT.DELETE_AT, TT.WRITNG_ID, TO_CHAR(TT.WRITNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') WRITNG_DE, TT.UPDT_ID, TO_CHAR(TT.UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDT_DE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_GOODS TG WHERE TG.CL_CODE = TT.CL_CODE) AS GOODS_CNT FROM TB_TOUR_CL TT WHERE TT.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND TT.CL_CODE = #cl_code#
